sense.name: Exclusive control or possession of something, as in economics or other domains.
sense.examples: When you have a monopoly, you can do almost anything. There are laws to prohibit monopolies.

sense.name: (game) a board game in which players try to gain a monopoly on real estate as pieces advance around the board according to the throw of a die.
sense.examples: Let's play Monopoly tonight. Monopoly is one of the best-selling games ever.
